titles.title: It is good to praise the Lord

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
It is good to praise the Lord,
And make music to His name.
O, most High.
– Repeat –
To proclaim His love in the morning,
And His, faithfulness at night,
This is my delight.
It is good to praise the Lord,
And make music to His name,
O, most High.
